CustomField.formula:
IF( Monday__c = true && Tuesday__c = true && Wednesday__c = true && Thursday__c = true && Friday__c = true && Saturday__c = true && Sunday__c = true, "7 Day Delivery (Monday-Sunday)",
If(Monday__c = true && Tuesday__c = true && Wednesday__c = true && Thursday__c = true && Friday__c = true, "Monday-Friday Delivery",
If(Monday__c = false && Tuesday__c = false && Wednesday__c = false && Thursday__c = false && Friday__c = false && Saturday__c = true && Sunday__c = true, "Saturday-Sunday Delivery",
If(Monday__c = false && Tuesday__c = false && Wednesday__c = false && Thursday__c = false && Friday__c = false && Saturday__c = false && Sunday__c = true, "Sunday Only Delivery",
If(Monday__c = false && Tuesday__c = false && Wednesday__c = false && Thursday__c = true && Friday__c = true && Saturday__c = true && Sunday__c = true, "Thursday-Sunday delivery","N/A" ) ) )))
CustomField.label: Frequency Code
